inclusion.criterion: WHO class I -IV (mPAP ≥ 25 mm Hg, pulmonary arterial occlusion pressure ≤15 mm Hg)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: men and women 18 years of age or older
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: patient is diagnosed with Pulmonary Arterial Hypertension (World Health Organization (WHO) Category Group 1)
inclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients experiencing oxygen desaturations ≤90% (or pO2 below 60 mmHg) at rest and/or during physical activity
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: patient has a stable functional class of PAH with no changes of medication during the trial
exclusion.label: met

notes: Patient has oxygen desaturations ≤90% (or pO2 below 60 mmHg) at rest and/or during physical activity, which is a trigger for exclusion.
